title: This one-tap business card is the ultimate networking tool. And it's only $12
description: The Linq card, when tapped, presents your contact information on your recipient's phone. It would make an awesome gift for a coworker, too.

title: EufyCam 3 and HomeBase 3 review: Why I'm not getting rid of these cameras yet
description: The Eufy Edge Security System, consisting of two EufyCams 3 and the HomeBase 3, is an entire security system on its own.

title: Delta Air Lines finds an outrageous way to insult important customers
description: When you can't solve a problem, do you have to annoy some of your best customers?

title: It's 30 years since the first text. Here's how far civilization has fallen
description: Do you ever wonder what texting has done to our behavior? Well, please let me give you some data.
